## iter8 gen

generate formatted output from experiment spec and result

### Synopsis

Generate formatted output from experiment spec and result

```
iter8 gen [flags]
```

### Examples

```

	# download the load-test experiment
	iter8 hub -e load-test

	cd load-test

	# run it
	iter8 run

	# generate formatted output
	iter8 gen

```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for gen
```
